element.short: Additonal information to support referral or transfer of care request
element.definition: Any additional (administrative, financial or clinical) information required to support request for referral or transfer of care.  For example: Presenting problems/chief complaints Medical History Family History Alerts Allergy/Intolerance and Adverse Reactions Medications Observations/Assessments (may include cognitive and fundtional assessments) Diagnostic Reports Care Plan.
